english.segment1: Holy is a tough word. In the vocab of man. To separate ourselves. From the jaws of sin. Wise is the man. That fears the great I AM
english.segment2: I'm called to serve my God. I'm called to serve my Lord
english.segment3: Should I rouse myself to this. Unsullied walking with the feet. Unsullied talking with the tongue. Unsullied thinking with the mind. The destined end of man. Is not happiness nor health
english.segment4: But holiness with God. But holiness with God
english.segment5: When God begins to check. Do not confer with flesh. But cleanse yourself at once
english.segment6: I'm declaring the claim. I'm declaring the claim. The Father has on me. I'm declaring the claim. I'm declaring the claim
